description: Need to know the weather forecast up to 15 days from now? Just ask AccuWeather â€“ Weather for Life. Our updated skill includes great new features to keep you connected to the Superior Accuracy more people trust than any other weather source. Simply ask for weather forecasts including RealFeel temperature up to 15 days out for any global location. Plus, get severe weather alerts, local summaries, weekend forecasts, sunrise/sunset to help you plan with confidence.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask AccuWeather what is the weather like today?
Alexa, ask AccuWeather what is the weather for next weekend?
name: AccuWeather
shortDescription: Stay connected to the latest in weather forecasting with AccuWeather. Ask for weather forecasts up to 15 days, for global locations, to better plan your life.
